* ABSOLUTELY NO SMOKING.
* No pets (sorry).
* Please respect the premises as you'll want to find it in pristine condition next season.

images.title: Enjoy the lovely Snow Monkey 1, where you will find everything you need for the best experience imaginable
Gather 'round in the living room and enjoy unforgettable moments with your friends and family.
Find your place on the comfy living room sofa.
The open-concept design living area allows you to change your settings quickly without missing a moment of fun.
Cuddle up next to the intimate fireplace.
Serve your delicious meals easily at the lovely dining table.
Prepare your favorite meals in the spacious, fully equipped kitchen.
Feel free to help yourself with anything you see in the kitchen.
The lower-floor powder room is accessible from the hallway.
Sleep like a royal family member on the queen-size bed in the master bedroom.
Keep your clothes clean and wrinkle-free in the spacious wardrobe with hangers and shelves.
Enjoy the convenience of having an ensuite bath.
Pamper yourself in the tub overlooking the bedroom.
Comfortable, plushy mattress in the guest bedroom will have you sleeping on clouds.
The muted palette and open-plan design imparts a light, Zen atmosphere for all to feel at home.
Wash your troubles away in the lovely guest bathroom.
The three bedrooms accommodate all guests comfortably with parallel attention to detail.
Resort-like comforts wait for you in all three bedrooms.
Store your gear in the heated ski locker room.
You'll be mesmerized by the beautiful views of Mount Yotei.
We are situated directly on the green shuttle bus line.
The Niseko mountain biking scene is growing in popularity over recent years with the addition of two lift access courses in Hirafu; a 3km downhill course.
Floorplan lower floor
Floorplan higher floor
Starting in the NAC Mountain Gear Shop the wall stretches up through the second floor JoJos restaurant.
Shiribetsu River is one of the cleanest in Japan and offers 7km of white water rapids as well as some gentle stretches for thrill-seekers of all abilities.
Resort golf at its best, this par 73, 18 holes and 6,845 yard course is suited to all levels of golfers.

location_descriptions.title: 虻田郡, 北海道, Japan
location_descriptions.content: There is only one place to stay to fully appreciate Niseko: Hirafu Village! You will be within walking distance to the ski lifts and all notable restaurants & bars. Have we mentioned that the local hot-spring is just steps away?

location_descriptions.title: Getting around
location_descriptions.content: You can walk to almost any place you need, but for frigid days, you'll have the free shuttle stopping meters away from the lodge.

highlights.title: Dedicated workspace
highlights.subtitle: A common area with wifi that’s well suited for working.

highlights.title: Self check-in
highlights.subtitle: Check yourself in with the lockbox.

highlights.title: Free cancellation for 48 hours
highlights.subtitle: Get a full refund if you change your mind.

description:
Proudly Superhost since 2014.

Step into the comfort of this inviting 3BR 2.5Bath house in the picturesque Hirafu Village. It promises a relaxing retreat within walking distance to ski lifts, hot springs, restaurants, shops, bars, and the free shuttle bus that take you anywhere in the resort.

The stylish design will leave you in awe.

✔ 3 Comfy BRs
✔ Open Design Living + Fireplace
✔ Air Conditioning
✔ Full Kitchen
✔ Balcony
✔ Smart TV
✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi
✔ Ski Locker Room
✔ Free Parking

The space
"We loved staying at Snow Monkey! The location was central and easily walkable to downtown, the living room was perfect for our family of 6, the bedrooms were comfy, and the bathrooms were perfect. Five stars!"

Let's start our tour of the beautiful Show Monkey 2 on the upper floor, where you'll be greeted by the stylish yet very comfortable open living area. Its elegant design and décor complement the fantastic location in mesmerizing Hirafu Village.

The fully equipped kitchen blends with the dining area, where you'll cook and enjoy tasty meals with your family and friends before relaxing in the living room, setting the scene for memorable evenings. Natural light bursts through large floor-to-ceiling windows, accenting the tastefully picked décor and enriching the pleasant setting.

Relax in three cozy bedrooms boasting fantastic comforts to offer a delightful stay and maximum privacy after spending the day at the ski slopes or exploring exciting attractions and natural landmarks.

Finally, you can step onto the private balcony to catch some fresh air and enjoy a glass of fine wine, enjoying views of the village.

There's so much to do in this inviting house. We look forward to you experiencing its complete comfort and coziness.

★ LIVING ROOM ★
It immediately feels like home! Find your place on the comfy sofa, cuddle up with a good book by the fireplace, or discuss your upcoming Niseko adventures.

✔ Comfortable Sofa
✔ Smart TV with Netflix
✔ Air Conditioning
✔ iPod Player
✔ Indoor Fireplace
✔ Comfy Sofa & Accent Chairs
✔ Coffee Table
✔ Designer Reading Lamp

★ KITCHEN & DINING ★
The fully equipped kitchen features modern appliances for preparing delicious snacks, breakfasts, or three-course gourmet dinners. Ample countertops offer plenty of room to unleash your cooking creativity.

✔ Stove
✔ Oven
✔ Toaster
✔ Rice Maker
✔ French Press
✔ Hot Water Kettle
✔ Refrigerator/Freezer
✔ Sink - Hot & Cold Water
✔ Trays
✔ Glasses
✔ Silverware
✔ Pots & Pans

Unwind and catch up with your loved ones in the gorgeous living room while the food is getting ready. When done, serve it on the dining table and enjoy a delicious meal in an inviting and warm atmosphere.

✔ Dining Table with Seating for 8

★ SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS – 3 BEDROOMS ★
After a day at the slopes and onsens, you will look to rest for an equally entertaining tomorrow. Once you are ready to relax, please make your way to these comfortable bedrooms, all nestled on the lower level.

♛ Master Bedroom: Queen-Size Bed, Workspace (Desk, Chair), Ensuite Bathroom
♛ Bedroom 2: Queen-Size Bed
♛ Bedroom 3: Queen-Size Bed

All bedrooms are equipped with a similar set of amenities.

✔ Premium Pillows, Linens, and Sheets
✔ Closets with Hangers and Shelves
✔ Night Stands with Reading Lamps

★ BATHROOMS ★
In addition to the master bedroom's ensuite bathroom, another full bathroom and a convenient half bath are accessible from the hallway. All are stocked with fresh, pampering towels and toiletries to ensure a hassle-free stay.

✔ Designer Soaker Tub + Separate Walk-In Shower (Master Bath)
✔ Walk-In Shower
✔ Vanity (Double in the Master Bath)
✔ Mirror
✔ Toilet
✔ Towels
✔ Hair Dryer
✔ Essential Toiletries

Guest access
Guest access

The house is exclusively yours, without interruption during your stay, so relax, unwind, and make yourself at home.

Other than the already mentioned amenities, our home is also equipped with the following:

✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi
✔ Self Check-In (Lockbox)
✔ Air Conditioning
✔ Heating
✔ Heated Ski Locker Room
✔ Iron/Board
✔ Washer
✔ Free Parking

Other things to note
★ CLEANING & SANITIZATION ★
Health, safety, and well-being of our guests are of utmost importance. For this reason, we use a thorough cleaning process after each check-out.

★ NO PETS ALLOWED ★
We love those little (and not so little) furry bundles of joy. Sadly, our home is not suitable to accommodate them.

★ NO SMOKING INSIDE ★
Please refrain from smoking inside the home! Any smoking evidence will incur a fee for odor removal and furniture cleaning.

★ NO PARTIES/EVENTS ★
We kindly ask you to treat our home as your own to preserve its pristine condition for future guests and your return visits.

Thank you very much for your understanding.

Registration number
Hotels and Inns Business Act | 北海道倶知安保健所 | 後保生第 ５５０ 号指令
